com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.utils

Class SCUIXAPIActionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.utils.SCUIXAPIActionUtils

  • public class SCUIXAPIActionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    SCUIXAPIActionUtil class is an utility class used XAPI mashup action classes like SCUIXAPIMashupAction and SCUIXAPIAggregatorMashup. This class has utility methods to convert the input given in the request into XML format.

    • Method Detail

      • validateMashup

        public static boolean validateMashup(java.lang.String mashupId,
                                     java.lang.String actionName,
                                     boolean throwEx)
        This method validated mashup id provided as struts parameter. Currently this class just checks for a value; and does not do any real validation on mashup id. Any class extending SCUIXAPIMashupAction can extend this method and write custom logic. mashupId is of type String set as the struts param. actionName is of type String and represents the action name given in ServletActionContext. throwEx pass true if this method should throw exception if validation fails. true of validation is successful.

      • getInputElement

        public static org.w3c.dom.Element getInputElement(SCUIContext uiContext,
                                                  java.lang.String inputNs)
        This method, looks for element with the given namespaces in request parameters, or request attributes, or local session attributes or session attributes in the same order. uiContext is of type SCUIContext inputNs is of the type String inputEl of type Element

      • validateMashupInput

        public static void validateMashupInput(SCUIContext context,
                                       java.lang.String mashupId,
                                       org.w3c.dom.Element inputEl)
